617130.name: Fantasy Grounds - H2-The Maze Under Stormpeak 4E Fantasy (Token Pack)
617130.description:
H2-The Maze Under Stormpeak

4E Fantasy Token Pack
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Ground II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in
your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and
product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game.
Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32,
50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best
meets your needs.
This pack contains tokens for the following characters:
  • angel valor (medium)
  • arbalester (medium)
  • bat fire (medium)
  • boar dire (large)
  • bronze warder (large)
  • brug (large)
  • choker cavern (small)
  • demon barlgura (large)
  • demon evistro (medium)
  • devil imp (tiny)
  • devil spined (medium)
  • doomsphere (large)
  • dragon green young (large)
  • drake rage (large)
  • dreaded sorceror 01
  • duergar guard (medium)
  • duergar master smith (medium)
  • duergar miner (medium)
  • duergar murkelmor (medium)
  • duergar scout (medium)

Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Doug Davison
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Doug Davison
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
